name: cwl-hello-world-workflow
description: A Hello World example demonstrating Common Workflow Language (CWL) with RO-Crate packaging

scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run hello:default && npm run hello:custom
scripts.test:ro-crate: cd hello_world-ro-crate && python3 -m cwltool hello_world.cwl hello_world-job.json
scripts.ro-crate:validate: cd hello_world-ro-crate && python3 -m json.tool ro-crate-metadata.json > /dev/null && echo 'RO-Crate metadata JSON is valid'
scripts.ro-crate:rebuild: npm run ro-crate:remove && npm run ro-crate:build
